subject: Mid-Atlantic States (US)
Horse Racing
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Regulation and Deregulation of Industry
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Eight states across the mid-Atlantic region, including New York, agreed to operate racetracks under one set of rules that will severely restrict the administration of medication to horses.
snippet: Eight states across the mid-Atlantic region, including New York, agreed to operate racetracks under one set of rules that will severely restrict the administration of medication to horses.
